verses.text: Mamin Jehová, t'a smasanil in k'ool tzin nib'ej swal wach' lolonel t'ayach, svalanel yab'ixal masanil tastac satub'tac ix a k'ulej.
Ach Dios, te ek' ach to t'a yib'anh smasanil, uuj val tzin avaj t'a niwan tzalajk'olal. In gana tzach in b'itej.
D'a val ichanh ix b'atcan eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin elelal. Ix telvi eb', ix cham eb'.
Yajal ach t'a stojolal. k'ojan ach em t'a a despacho, ix a b'oan yaj tas ix in k'an t'ayach.
Ix ak'an oval yet' juntzanh eb' ch'oc chonhab'il. Ix ak' telvoc eb' sk'ulan chukal. Ix a sucsat sb'i eb' yic wach' maxtzac nachajcot eb' t'a b'ak'uinh.
Toxo ix cham eb' ajk'ool, ix satel schonhab' eb' t'a junelnhej. Ha ach ix a sateli, manhxalaj junok ix cani, yic wach' maxtzac nachajcoti.
Ha achxo ach Jehová, toxonton rey ach t'a masanil tiempo. k'ojan ach em t'a a despacho yic tza ch'olb'itan eb' anima.
Ol a ch'olb'itej yol yib'anhk’inal tik t'a wach'il. Ol ach och yajalil t'a masanil chonhab' t'a stojolal.
Ach Jehová, tza col eb' tz'ixtaji, tzak' yip eb' ayic ayoch eb' t'a nivac yaelal.
Mamin Jehová, yipk'olal aj yuj eb' ojtannac ach, yujto malaj b'aj tzactejcan eb' ayic syalan sb'a eb' t'ayach.
B'itananhec t'a Jehová Cajal t'a Sion, alec yab' eb' chonhab' tastac ix sk'ulej.
Manh tonhejoc tz'iljioch eb' milumcham anima yuj Dios, max b'atcanlaj satk'olal syaelal eb' ayoch t'a ilk'olal yuj.
Mamin Jehová, ok'ocab' a k'ool t'ayin, il in emta, te ya tzin ek' yuj eb' tzin chacaneli. Colinel t'a chamel.
Ichato val chi' b'ian, ol valan wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a yichanh eb' anima t'a spuertail Jerusalén. Tzin tzalaji, yujto ix in a colcaneli.
Ha juntzanh ch'oc chonhab'il chi', ix telviem eb' t'a yol jun olan ix sb'o'o. Ha yoc eb' syamchaj yuj ch'anh yaal ix yaq'uem chi'.
Ojtacab'il Jehová yujto tojol syutej spactzitan tas sk'ulej anima. Munil syik'cot yaelal eb' sk'ulan chukal t'a yib'anh.
Ha eb' sk'ulan chukal yet' eb' sb'atcan Dios satk'olal yuj, ol b'atcan eb' t'a chamel.
Manh masaniloc tiempo ol b'atcan eb' meb'a' satk'olal yuj Dios. Ol javok sk'ual ol elk'och tastac ayoch yipoc sk'ool eb'.
Mamin Jehová, ch'oxel ipalil. Mocab' yik'chaanh sb'a eb' anima t'ayach. Ik'cot juntzanh chonhab' t'a ichanh, tzak'an syaelal eb'.
Ak'och eb' t'a xivk'olal. Ak' yojtaquejel eb' to animanhej eb'.
